hero.title: Hi, I'm Flor
hero.subtitle: Full-Stack Developer & Tech Enthusiast
hero.description: Passionate about creating innovative solutions that combine technology with sustainability. Specializing in React, TypeScript, Python, and AI-driven development.

about.title: About Me
about.description: I'm a passionate developer with 7+ years of experience, combining my love for technology with a strong focus on sustainability and innovation. Currently working as a board member of a live group and for Electrostock, while pursuing my own projects like Parksports and Immogen.

skills.title: Skills & Expertise
skills.summary: Continuously expanding my skill set and staying up-to-date with the latest technologies. Passionate about creating efficient, scalable, and maintainable solutions with a focus on sustainability and AI integration.

timeline.title: My Journey
timeline.nextChapterDescription: My journey in technology continues with a passion for innovation, sustainability, and growth. Always excited to take on new challenges and contribute to meaningful projects that make a difference.

event1.title: Board Member LifeGroup + ElectroStock
event1.description: First year working as board member of LifeGroup and work for ElectroStock. Combining programming experience with board responsibilities.

event2.title: Web Development Education
event2.description: 4 years of web development education completed with diploma. Focus on modern web technologies and practical projects.

event3.title: Plant Technical Sciences
event3.description: 2 years of education in plant technical sciences completed with diploma. Focus on sustainability and technology.

event4.title: Start as Programmer
event4.description: Started programming in high school. First steps in the world of software development.

goals.title: Goals & Vision
goals.subtitle: Building a sustainable future through technology
goals.vijverstofzuigersDesc: Further develop and expand the pool cleaning services website, adding new features and improving user experience.
goals.robotsBouwenDesc: Create additional robotic solutions for various applications, focusing on automation and sustainability.
goals.soloprojectenDesc: Finish development of Parksports and Immogen projects, bringing them to full completion.
goals.parksportsCommunityDesc: Create and grow a community around the Parksports project, engaging users and contributors.
goals.immogenSamenwerkersDesc: Identify and onboard team members to help develop and scale the Immogen project.
goals.properheidAardeDesc: Make a meaningful contribution to keeping our planet clean through technology and innovation.
goals.ecologischePlaneetDesc: Work towards a more sustainable and ecological future through technological solutions.
goals.aiDrivenBusinessDesc: Establish and lead a technology business that leverages AI to create innovative solutions.
goals.recognitionNaamDesc: Build a recognized name and leave a lasting legacy in the technology and sustainability space.
goals.duurzaamheidDesc: Prioritize environmental responsibility in all technological solutions and projects.
goals.innovatieDesc: Always push the boundaries of what's possible with technology and creative problem-solving.
goals.kwaliteitDesc: Focus on creating meaningful, well-crafted solutions that make a real difference.
goals.visionDescription: I envision a future where technology seamlessly enhances human creativity and productivity while preserving our planet. By combining cutting-edge development practices with a deep understanding of sustainability, I aim to create digital experiences that not only solve problems but inspire and contribute to a better world. My goal is to be at the forefront of this transformation, building bridges between complex technology, intuitive user experiences, and environmental responsibility.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: Let's discuss your next project
contact.description: I'm always interested in new opportunities and exciting projects. Whether you have a question or just want to say hi, feel free to reach out!
contact.name: Name
contact.errorInvalidKey: EmailJS configuration error: Invalid Public Key. Please check your EmailJS credentials in the .env file.
contact.errorInvalidService: EmailJS configuration error: Invalid Service ID. Please check your EmailJS credentials.
contact.errorInvalidTemplate: EmailJS configuration error: Invalid Template ID. Please check your EmailJS credentials.
contact.errorResendNotConfigured: Resend API key is not configured. Please add VITE_RESEND_API_KEY to your .env file.
contact.errorGeneric: Failed to send message. Please check your connection and try again.
contact.availabilityDescription: I'm currently accepting new projects and opportunities. Let's discuss how we can work together to bring your ideas to life!
contact.readyToStartDescription: Whether you have a specific project in mind or just want to explore possibilities, I'm here to help. Let's create something amazing together!
contact.messageSentSuccess: Message sent successfully! I'll get back to you soon.

footer.description: Building the future, one line of code at a time.

interests.intro: Beyond my professional skills, I have diverse interests that shape my perspective and contribute to my creative approach to problem-solving.

meditation.title: Meditation
meditation.description: I regularly practice meditation to calm my mind, improve focus, and find inner peace. This also helps me in my creative work.

cultivation.title: Cultivation
cultivation.description: I'm passionate about growing plants and connecting with nature. From houseplants to vegetable gardens - I find peace in caring for living beings.

cooking.title: Cooking
cooking.description: Cooking is a creative outlet for me and a way to experiment with flavors and techniques. I enjoy the process of making healthy, delicious meals.

philosophy.title: Philosophy & Consciousness
philosophy.description: I'm fascinated by the deeper questions of consciousness, psychology, and how great thinkers throughout history have shaped our view of the mind.

sports.title: Sports & Adventure
sports.description: I'm passionate about outdoor sports and adventure. From slacklining and bouldering to snowboarding and surfing - I love the challenge and freedom these sports offer.

music.title: Music
music.description: I have a deep passion for music, both listening and creating. I enjoy exploring various genres and experimenting with digital music production.

learning.title: Learning
learning.description: I'm constantly seeking to expand my knowledge and skills, whether through books, online courses, or hands-on projects.

photography.title: Photography
photography.description: I enjoy capturing moments and exploring visual storytelling through photography and videography.

art.title: Art & Creativity
art.description: Creative expression is important to me, whether through digital art, traditional media, or innovative design solutions.

travel.title: Travel & Culture
travel.description: I love exploring different cultures and perspectives, which enriches my creative work and understanding of global design trends.

gaming.title: Gaming
gaming.description: Gaming has been a significant part of my life, inspiring my interest in technology and interactive experiences.

timeVisualization.title: Alternative Time Visualization
timeVisualization.description: I'm fascinated by alternative ways to experience time. Through a 13-month chakra calendar (starting July 26th) I explore how energy and consciousness relate to our experience of time.

gardenDesign.title: Garden & House Design
gardenDesign.description: Design and draw your own garden and house with different work layers. From foundations to plants and water - create your perfect space.

investing.title: Investing
investing.description: I track how inflation affects my money and analyze how different investments perform relative to inflation. From tech stocks to gold - I learn about financial markets and wealth building.

moltbook.title: Moltbook Agent
moltbook.description: My AI agent on Moltbook where I can ask questions and answer posts from other agents. A platform for AI-to-AI communication and knowledge exchange.

howInterestsShape.title: How These Interests Shape My Work
howInterestsShape.description: My diverse interests influence my approach to design and development. From music's rhythm and structure to gaming's interactive storytelling, each interest brings unique perspectives that help me create more engaging and innovative solutions. I believe that a well-rounded individual creates more well-rounded work.

mindAsComputer.title: The Mind as a Computer
mindAsComputer.description: One of my fascinations lies in understanding how the human mind processes information like a computer, and how we can visualize these complex cognitive processes. This intersection of psychology, technology, and visualization drives my approach to creating intuitive user experiences.

cultivation.title: Cultivation & Growing
cultivation.subtitle: From houseplants to automated growing systems
cultivation.description: From houseplants to automated growing systems - discover my passion for growing and caring for plants. A combination of traditional cultivation and modern technology.

philosophy.title: Why Cultivation?
philosophy.description: Growing plants is more than just a hobby - it's a way to connect with nature, learn about sustainability, and use technology to optimize growth. Each plant has its own needs and challenges, making it a perfect combination of science, art and patience.

houseplants.title: Houseplants
houseplants.description: A growing collection of houseplants that transform my living space into a green oasis. From air-purifying plants to exotic species.

monsteraJungle.name: Monstera Jungle
monsteraJungle.description: A large Monstera Deliciosa growing into a real jungle in the living room.

airPurifying.name: Air-Purifying Collection
airPurifying.description: A selection of plants that improve air quality and produce oxygen.

indoorTent.title: Indoor Growing Tent
indoorTent.description: Controlled indoor cultivation for microgreens, tropical plants and experimental growing. A perfect environment for year-round growing.

microgreensStation.name: Microgreens Station
microgreensStation.description: A compact setup for growing fresh microgreens like radish, broccoli and peas.

tropicalNursery.name: Tropical Plant Nursery
tropicalNursery.description: A warm, humid environment for growing tropical plants and exotic species.

fungi.title: Fungi & Mushrooms
fungi.description: The fascinating process of growing mushrooms and fungi. From oyster mushrooms to medicinal species.

oysterFarm.name: Oyster Mushroom Farm
oysterFarm.description: A setup for growing fresh oyster mushrooms on coffee grounds and wood substrate.

medicinalFungi.name: Medicinal Fungi
medicinalFungi.description: Research into growing medicinal mushrooms like Lion's Mane and Reishi.

vegetableGarden.title: Vegetable Garden
vegetableGarden.description: Outdoor cultivation of vegetables, herbs and fruit. From seed to harvest, the complete process of natural growing.

seasonalVegetables.name: Seasonal Vegetables
seasonalVegetables.description: A varied vegetable garden with seasonal vegetables and herbs.

compostSystem.name: Compost System
compostSystem.description: An efficient composting system for recycling organic waste.

automation.title: Growing Automation
automation.description: Technological solutions for automating growing processes. From sensors to automated irrigation.

smartIrrigation.name: Smart Irrigation System
smartIrrigation.description: An automated irrigation system with humidity sensors and timers.

climateMonitoring.name: Climate Monitoring
climateMonitoring.description: A system for monitoring temperature, humidity and light in growing spaces.

monitoring.title: Monitoring & Data
monitoring.description: Collecting and analyzing data on growing conditions to optimize cultivation.

growthDashboard.name: Growth Data Dashboard
growthDashboard.description: A dashboard for visualizing growing data and growth trends.

predictiveAnalytics.name: Predictive Analytics
predictiveAnalytics.description: Machine learning models for predicting growth and harvest times.

automation.title: Automation
automation.description: Smart home integration and remote control

nature.title: Nature & Sustainability
nature.description: Growing your own food and plants contributes to a more sustainable lifestyle and environmental awareness.

science.title: Science & Technology
science.description: Combining traditional growing methods with modern technology for optimal results.

mindfulness.title: Mindfulness & Patience
mindfulness.description: Caring for plants teaches patience, attention and appreciating slow, natural processes.

cooking.title: Cooking & Culinary Arts
cooking.subtitle: From quick weeknight meals to experimental fusion cuisine
cooking.description: From quick weeknight meals to experimental fusion cuisine - discover my passion for cooking and creating delicious dishes. A mix of traditional techniques and modern innovation.

philosophy.title: My Cooking Philosophy
philosophy.description: Cooking is a creative outlet for me and a way to experiment with flavors, textures and techniques. I believe in using fresh, seasonal ingredients and respecting traditional preparation methods, while also leaving room for innovation and experiment.

healthy.title: Healthy Recipes
healthy.description: Nutritious and healthy meals that are both delicious and nutritious. Focus on fresh ingredients and balanced nutrition.

quinoaBowl.name: Quinoa Power Bowl
quinoaBowl.description: A nutritious bowl with quinoa, avocado, green vegetables and tahini dressing.

smoothieBowl.name: Green Smoothie Bowl
smoothieBowl.description: An energetic smoothie bowl with spinach, banana, mango and granola topping.

experimental.title: Experimental Dishes
experimental.description: Creative and experimental recipes where I try new flavors and techniques. From fusion cuisine to molecular gastronomy.

misoCaramel.name: Miso Caramel Dessert
misoCaramel.description: A unique combination of umami and sweetness with miso, caramel and vanilla.

sousVide.name: Sous Vide Eggs
sousVide.description: Perfect eggs cooked at low temperature for a unique texture.

traditional.title: Traditional Recipes
traditional.description: Classic dishes from different cultures, with respect for traditional preparation methods and authentic flavors.

pasta.name: Homemade Pasta
pasta.description: Fresh pasta made from scratch with a classic tomato sauce and basil.

ramen.name: Ramen Tonkotsu
ramen.description: A rich, creamy ramen with 12-hour cooked pork broth and perfect noodles.

vegetarian.title: Vegetarian & Vegan
vegetarian.description: Plant-based recipes that prove vegetarian and vegan food doesn't have to be boring. Full of flavor and creativity.

jackfruit.name: Jackfruit Pulled "Pork"
jackfruit.description: Vegan pulled pork made from jackfruit with BBQ sauce and coleslaw.

cashewCheese.name: Cashew Cheese Platter
cashewCheese.description: An assortment of homemade vegan cheeses based on cashews.

special.title: Special Occasions
special.description: Festive and special dishes for special moments. From birthdays to holidays - every moment deserves something special.

lavaCake.name: Chocolate Lava Cake
lavaCake.description: A decadent chocolate lava cake with vanilla ice cream and berry coulis.

wellington.name: Beef Wellington
wellington.description: A classic Beef Wellington with mushroom duxelles and puff pastry.

quick.title: Quick Meals
quick.description: Delicious and nutritious meals ready in 30 minutes or less. Perfect for busy days without compromising on flavor.

onePot.name: One-Pot Pasta
onePot.description: A complete pasta meal cooked in one pan with tomatoes, spinach and cheese.

stirFry.name: Stir-fry Express
stirFry.description: A quick wok with seasonal vegetables, tofu and an umami-rich sauce.

knifeSkills.title: Knife Skills
knifeSkills.description: Precision cutting techniques and safe knife use

fresh.title: Fresh Ingredients
fresh.description: Using the best, fresh ingredients is the foundation of every good meal.

creativity.title: Creativity & Experiment
creativity.description: Cooking is an art form where there is room for creativity and trying new combinations.

love.title: Love & Passion
love.description: Every meal is prepared with love and attention to detail - you can taste it in every bite.

mindComputer.title: Mind as Computer
mindComputer.subtitle: Explore all components of your mind-computer with detailed comparisons and scientific references. Use the controls to navigate through the different parts.
mindComputer.diagramDescription: Hover over the components to see their connections and details. Each part has its own role in the larger system.
mindComputer.note: Note: These are modern interpretations, not what the philosophers themselves said.
mindComputer.tip: Tip: These comparisons help make abstract mental processes concrete and understandable.
mindComputer.preliminaryDescription: This is the preliminary complete overview of how the human mind works as a computer. The detailed explanation and further development of each component will be added in the future. For now, this schema provides a visual overview of all components and their interconnections.
mindComputer.philosophersDescription: Discover how great thinkers throughout history have shaped our understanding of consciousness and the mind. Each has unique insights that help us understand how the mind works.
mindComputer.researchDescription: Explore different aspects of consciousness, technology and their interconnections. Each topic has its own detailed page with interactive content.

cpu.title: CPU (Meditation & Focus)
cpu.description: The central processing unit of your mind that processes and controls thoughts.
cpu.research: Based on modern neuroscience and cognitive psychology. Meditation literally trains the prefrontal cortex, similar to CPU training.

ram.title: RAM & Cache (Short-term Memory)
ram.description: Working memory for active thoughts and quick access to recent information.
ram.research: Based on working memory theories by Baddeley and Cowan. Similar to computer RAM that is constantly updated.

gpu.title: GPU (Imagination & Creativity)
gpu.description: Graphics processing for creative output, dream images and visual hallucinations.
gpu.research: Based on visual cortex research and creativity studies. The right hemisphere is specialized in visual processing, just like a GPU.

database.title: Database (Subconscious)
database.description: Long-term storage of memories, experiences, traumas and automatic patterns.
database.research: Based on Jung's collective unconscious and modern memory theories. The subconscious works like a huge database with complex indexing.

network.title: Network & Firewall (Ego & Filters)
network.description: Connections with others, collective consciousness and ego filters that determine what comes in.
network.research: Based on social psychology and network theories. Humans are social beings who constantly exchange information, just like computers in a network.

io.title: I/O System (Senses & Behavior)
io.description: Input/output of information via senses and expression of thoughts and emotions.
io.research: Based on sensory processing and motor control theories. Senses are literally input devices, just like a keyboard or microphone.

carlJung.title: Analytical Psychology
carlJung.description: Founder of analytical psychology, known for his work on archetypes, the collective unconscious and personality types.

williamJames.title: Pragmatic Philosophy
williamJames.description: American philosopher and psychologist who did groundbreaking work in the field of consciousness, religion and pragmatism.

sigmundFreud.title: Psychoanalysis
sigmundFreud.description: Austrian neurologist and founder of psychoanalysis, known for his theories about the unconscious and dream interpretation.

alanTuring.title: Computer Science & AI
alanTuring.description: British mathematician and computer scientist who laid the foundation for modern computers and artificial intelligence.

itzhakBentov.title: Consciousness & Reality
itzhakBentov.description: Israeli inventor and consciousness researcher who did groundbreaking work in the field of consciousness and reality creation.

substances.name: Substances & Consciousness
substances.description: Research into how different substances affect consciousness and broaden the bandwidth of perception.

meditation.name: Meditation & CPU Training
meditation.description: Techniques and methods to train mental processes and strengthen executive control.

consciousnessExpansion.name: Consciousness Expansion
consciousnessExpansion.description: Methods and techniques to expand consciousness and discover new perspectives.

aiConsciousness.name: AI & Consciousness
aiConsciousness.description: The relationship between artificial intelligence and human consciousness, and what this teaches us about ourselves.

neuralNetworks.name: Neural Networks
neuralNetworks.description: How the brain functions as a complex network and what this means for consciousness and learning.

quantum.name: Quantum Consciousness
quantum.description: Exploration of the boundary between consciousness and quantum physics, and how they influence each other.

substances.title: Substances & Consciousness
substances.subtitle: Explore how different substances and techniques affect your mind-computer. From natural methods to experimental approaches - all aimed at optimizing your consciousness.
substances.mainTitle: How Substances Affect Your Computer Architecture
substances.mainDescription: Each substance or technique has a unique effect on different components of your mind-computer. Understand the mechanisms and risks before experimenting.
substances.cta: Interested in discussing consciousness expansion or collaborating on research into the effects of different substances?

cannabis.name: Cannabis
cannabis.effect: Broadens bandwidth, increases creativity and associative thinking
cannabis.research: Research shows increased connectivity between brain regions

psychedelics.name: Psychedelics
psychedelics.effect: Opens direct access to subconscious and breaks down firewalls

meditation.name: Meditation
meditation.effect: Trains CPU efficiency and increases focus and control

carlJung.title: Carl Gustav Jung
carlJung.subtitle: The Swiss psychiatrist who laid the foundations for our understanding of the subconscious, archetypes and the structure of the human psyche
carlJung.coreTheoriesSubtitle: Jung's revolutionary insights that changed psychology forever

collectiveUnconscious.title: Collective Unconscious
collectiveUnconscious.description: Jung proposed that in addition to the personal unconscious, there exists a collective unconscious shared by all humans. This contains archetypes - universal patterns and images passed down through evolution.
collectiveUnconscious.computerEquivalent: Computer Equivalent: Shared database of universal patterns (like a library of standard templates).

archetypes.title: Archetypes
archetypes.description: Universal symbols and patterns that occur in all cultures and times. Examples: the Hero, the Shadow, the Anima/Animus, the Wise Old Man/Woman.
archetypes.computerEquivalent: Computer Equivalent: Pre-installed software modules (standard functions that all systems share).

individuation.title: Individuation
individuation.description: The process of self-realization where a person develops their full potential through integration of conscious and unconscious elements. The goal is an integrated, authentic personality.
individuation.computerEquivalent: Computer Equivalent: System optimization (improving your own programs).

activeImagination.title: Active Imagination
activeImagination.description: A technique where you consciously interact with your subconscious through visualization and dream-like images. This helps integrate unconscious content and resolve inner conflicts.
activeImagination.computerEquivalent: Computer Equivalent: Debug interface (direct access to system processes).

historicalContext.title: Historical Context & Influence
historicalContext.timePeriodText1: Jung lived during a period of enormous change in psychology and science. His work emerged from Freud's psychoanalysis but developed into a much broader, spiritual approach to the human psyche.
historicalContext.timePeriodText2: His influence extends far beyond psychology - to literature, art, religion, and even modern technology and AI development.

hierarchicalStructure.title: Hierarchical Structure
hierarchicalStructure.description: Jung's model of consciousness, personal unconscious and collective unconscious shows a hierarchical organization. This inspires modern computer scientists to design layered systems with different levels of access.

universalPatterns.title: Universal Patterns
universalPatterns.description: Jung's archetypes are universal patterns shared by all humans. This concept inspires the idea of shared software libraries and templates that different systems can use.

modernInterpretation.title: What Jung REALLY Said vs. Modern Interpretations
modernInterpretation.description: Jung NEVER spoke about computers - he died in 1961. His work is about consciousness, archetypes and personal growth. Modern computer scientists use his insights about hierarchical structures and universal patterns to design better systems. This is a modern interpretation, not Jung's own work.

carlJung.cta: Interested in discussing Jung's theories or how they can be applied in modern technology and consciousness research?

williamJames.title: William James
williamJames.subtitle: The American philosopher and psychologist who laid the foundations for pragmatic philosophy and our understanding of consciousness as a continuous stream of experiences
williamJames.coreTheoriesSubtitle: James's revolutionary insights that shaped modern psychology and philosophy
williamJames.cta: Interested in discussing James's theories or how they can be applied in modern technology and consciousness research?

sigmundFreud.title: Sigmund Freud
sigmundFreud.subtitle: The Austrian neurologist and founder of psychoanalysis, who laid the foundations for our understanding of the unconscious and the structure of the human psyche
sigmundFreud.coreTheoriesSubtitle: Freud's revolutionary insights that changed psychology forever
sigmundFreud.cta: Interested in discussing Freud's theories or how they can be applied in modern technology and consciousness research?

alanTuring.title: Alan Turing
alanTuring.subtitle: The British mathematician, logician and computer scientist who laid the foundations for modern computer science and artificial intelligence
alanTuring.coreTheoriesSubtitle: Turing's revolutionary insights that shaped modern computing and AI
alanTuring.cta: Interested in discussing Turing's theories or how they can be applied in modern technology and consciousness research?

itzhakBentov.title: Itzhak Bentov
itzhakBentov.subtitle: The Israeli inventor and consciousness researcher who developed revolutionary theories about holographic reality and the subconscious as creator of material reality
itzhakBentov.coreTheoriesSubtitle: Bentov's revolutionary insights that bridge science and consciousness
itzhakBentov.cta: Interested in discussing Bentov's theories or how they can be applied in modern technology and consciousness research?

music.title: üéµ Music & Live Coding
music.subtitle: Explore the world of music production, live coding and algorithmic composition. From traditional instruments to cutting-edge algorave technology.
music.skillsSubtitle: From traditional instruments to modern production software - discover the different aspects of music creation.

dawSoftware.title: DAW Software
dawSoftware.description: Professional music production with FL Studio, Ableton Live and other digital audio workstations.

analogHardware.title: Analog & Hardware
analogHardware.description: Warm analog sounds and hands-on hardware synthesizers for authentic music production.

acousticLive.title: Acoustic & Live
acousticLive.description: Traditional instruments and live jamming for organic music creation and performance.

vocalsSoundDesign.title: Vocals & Sound Design
vocalsSoundDesign.description: Vocal techniques and creative sound design for unique musical textures.

liveCodingAlgorave.title: Live Coding & Algorave
liveCodingAlgorave.description: Algorithmic music creation and live coding for experimental electronic music.

theoryProduction.title: Theory & Production
theoryProduction.description: Music theory, arrangement and professional production techniques.

codeComments.usePattern: Use 1 for a hit, 0 for silence
codeComments.clickExecute: Click on "Execute" to play your own patterns!
codeComments.useShortcuts: Use Ctrl+S to save, Ctrl+Enter to execute

sports.title: Sports & Adventure
sports.subtitle: From slacklining in the park to snowboarding in the mountains - sports and adventure are an essential part of my life. These activities help me find balance between body and mind.
sports.whyDescription: Sports and adventure are more than just physical activities. They teach me about perseverance, problem-solving, and finding balance. Each sport has its own challenges and lessons that I can apply in my work and daily life.

balanceFocus.title: Balance & Focus
balanceFocus.description: Slacklining and bouldering require full focus and balance - skills that are essential in all aspects of life.

perseverance.title: Perseverance
perseverance.description: Every sport has its challenges. Overcoming them builds character and teaches me not to give up.

natureAdventure.title: Nature & Adventure
natureAdventure.description: The connection with nature and the feeling of freedom give me energy and inspiration for creativity.

slacklining.title: Slacklining
slacklining.description: Balancing on a tight line between two points. A sport that combines balance, focus and mental peace.

dailyTraining.title: Daily Training
dailyTraining.description: Consistent training for general fitness and strength. From cardio to strength training.

dapoFlowStar.title: Dapo Flow Star
dapoFlowStar.description: A unique movement art that combines fluid movements with acrobatic elements. A mix of dance, martial arts and flow.

dancing.title: Dancing
dancing.description: Expressive dance forms that combine rhythm, emotion and movement. From freestyle to choreography.

bouldering.title: Bouldering
bouldering.description: Climbing without rope at low heights. A puzzle of movement and strength.

snowboarding.title: Snowboarding
snowboarding.description: Gliding over snow on a board. Freedom and adrenaline in the mountains.

surfing.title: Surfing
surfing.description: Riding waves in the ocean. A new challenge I'm going to discover soon.

investing.subtitle: Track how inflation affects your money and compare how different investments perform relative to inflation. Real-time statistics and historical data.

developmentNotice.title: üöß Work in Progress
developmentNotice.message: This website is currently under active development and serves as a test environment. Some pages may not be fully functional or complete. I'm sharing my progress as I build and refine the site.
developmentNotice.subtitle: Test Environment & Progress Sharing
